en.principle_subtitle: Jovision is committed to empowering our global partners through long-term collaboration, transparency, and growth opportunities.

principle_items.title: Brand Use
principle_items.subtitle: Rights to use, distribute, and market under the Jovision brand in your designated region.

principle_items.title: Dealership Guarantee
principle_items.subtitle: Ensures exclusive distribution for specific regions or models as per signed agreements.

principle_items.title: Credit Support
principle_items.subtitle: Financial assistance and credit options to help partners manage cash flow with insurance protection.

principle_items.title: Marketing Support
principle_items.subtitle: Access to marketing materials, social media content, seminars, and exhibition resources.

principle_items.title: Technical Support
principle_items.subtitle: Receive direct technical support and professional training from Jovision engineers.

principle_items.title: Sales Lead Support
principle_items.subtitle: Partners receive leads and inquiries directly from Jovision’s global marketing channels.

principle_items.title: Project Support
principle_items.subtitle: Assistance with topological design and model recommendations for project success.

principle_items.title: New Products & Technology
principle_items.subtitle: Priority access to test and deploy Jovision’s latest products and technologies.

id.principle_subtitle: Jovision berkomitmen untuk memberdayakan mitra global kami melalui kolaborasi jangka panjang, transparansi, dan peluang pertumbuhan.

principle_items.title: Penggunaan Merek
principle_items.subtitle: Hak untuk menggunakan, mendistribusikan, dan memasarkan di bawah merek Jovision di wilayah Anda.

principle_items.title: Jaminan Dealer
principle_items.subtitle: Menjamin distribusi eksklusif untuk wilayah atau model tertentu sesuai kontrak yang ditandatangani.

principle_items.title: Dukungan Kredit
principle_items.subtitle: Memberikan dukungan kredit untuk membantu mitra mengelola arus kas dengan perlindungan asuransi.

principle_items.title: Dukungan Pemasaran
principle_items.subtitle: Akses ke materi pemasaran, konten media sosial, seminar, dan sumber daya pameran.

principle_items.title: Dukungan Teknis
principle_items.subtitle: Mendapatkan dukungan teknis langsung dan pelatihan profesional dari insinyur Jovision.

principle_items.title: Dukungan Penjualan
principle_items.subtitle: Mitra menerima prospek dan permintaan langsung dari pemasaran global Jovision.

principle_items.title: Dukungan Proyek
principle_items.subtitle: Bantuan dalam desain topologi dan rekomendasi model untuk proyek mitra.

principle_items.title: Produk & Teknologi Baru
principle_items.subtitle: Prioritas untuk menguji produk terbaru dan teknologi inovatif dari Jovision.
